about_the_game:
You wake up as a ghost trapped in a haunted, maze-like house.

Fast-paced Gameplay

Solve ingenious puzzles while dodging enemies and traps in this challenging 2D puzzle game. Test your agility, precision, and quick thinking to conquer each level.

Simple Controls and Mechanics

Move only up, down, left, or right, sliding in straight lines until you hit a wall. Grab the key, dodge obstacles, and reach the door before time runs out! Easy to learn, but hard to master.

Adventures and Secrets

Explorers, get ready! Face challenging bosses and uncover secret rooms filled with mysteries and rewards. Adventure awaits you!

And More!

  • 🧩 Handcrafted Challenges
    Every puzzle and level has been meticulously designed to strike the balance between fun, challenge, and fairness.

  • ♾️ Infinite Gameplay
    Dive into secondary game modes with procedurally generated mini-levels that keep the gameplay fresh.

  • ⚡ Speedrunner-Friendly
    Crafted with care to challenge even the fastest and most skilled players. Show us what you're capable of!

So, are you ready to escape this haunted maze?

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS or greater
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512Mb
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 and above
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512Mb
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Like Them

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 and above
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512Mb
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: A fast-paced 2D puzzle game where you play as a cheerful ghost, moving in straight lines until hitting a wall. Navigate through a haunted house, dodge traps, evil ghosts, and escape before becoming like them!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Spanish - Latin America*, Japanese*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Portuguese - Portugal*
*languages with full audio support
